title: Metaphysician
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

> "Hitherto a social consciousness had been asleep and not even dreaming in human history. Before it awakened it produced nightmares."
> H.G. Wells, //The Outline of History//


[[=]]

[[size large]]**[https://www.patreon.com/Metaphysician CLICK HERE TO CHECK OUT MY PATREON IF YOU WISH TO DONATE]**[[/size]]

**Tiny acts have huge effects!**

And feel free to follow me on [https://twitter.com/thenevermeant twitter], [https://bsky.app/profile/metaphysician.bsky.social bluesky], and [https://www.tumblr.com/the-metaphysician tumblr]

[[/=]]
